title: No More Chances
description: NO MORE CHANCES, Book One of THE MADNESS OF POWER series, reflects the current state of the world, in all its violence, greed, and ignorance. Eric Atkins is a Vietnam vet, a college professor and a disillusioned activist trying desperately to inspire action and educate his students and anyone who'll listen about the dangerous environmental damage perpetrated by corporate greed. When he loses his job, Eric connects with ex-Marine buddies--CIA Agent Clay Perkins, billionaire Billy F. Johnstone and Billy's head of security, Rob Collings. Together, they have the resources to directly target and shut down the top serial polluters. Will their plan work? As Eric's old pal, Billy Johnstone, always says, "Everything's gonna be all right!" Or is it?
author: Steven J. Conners
